colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES PA CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI PHUR BU SGRUB PA'I CHO GA MCHOG THUN GYI DNGOS GRUB CHAR 'BEBS MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, TSUL 'KHRIMS DANG THOS BSAM BSGOM PA'I SHES RAB DANG LDAN PA GUNG PI LIG THU TZAS SANG THO YON CHOS 'PHEL DANG, AE RTE NI TZAS SANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS ZHES BYA BA GNYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR KHREL DU, ,BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED TZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SU SBYAR BA'O, ,)
